member.name: READ_DIRECTORY_NOTIFY_INFORMATION_CLASS
member.summary: Indicates the possible types of information that an application that calls the function can request.

member.name: READ_DIRECTORY_NOTIFY_INFORMATION_CLASS.ReadDirectoryNotifyInformation
member.summary: The function should provide information that describes the changes within the specified directory, and return this information in the output buffer in the form of structures.

member.name: READ_DIRECTORY_NOTIFY_INFORMATION_CLASS.ReadDirectoryNotifyExtendedInformation
member.summary: The function should provide extended information that describes the changes within the specified directory, and return this information in the output buffer in the form of structures.
